original_text: Sanballat, Tobiah, the Arab people, the Ammonites and the people who came from Ashdod all heard that the work was continuing. They could see that we were repairing the holes in the wall. So they were very angry.
korean_text: 산발랏과 도비야와 아라비아 사람들과 암몬 사람들과 아스돗 사람들이 예루살렘 성이 중수되어 그 허물어진 틈이 메꾸어져 간다 함을 듣고 심히 분노하여

sentences.original_text: the Ammonites and the people who came from Ashdod
all heard that the work was continuing
sentences.korean_translation: 그 일이 계속되고 있다는 것을 모두 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: They could see that we were repairing the holes in the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리가 성벽의 구멍들을 수리하고 있는 것을 볼 수 있었습니다
